title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services
description: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team for personalized assistance.
noResults: No questions found matching your search.

faqs.question: What is El7a2ny?
faqs.answer: El7a2ny is a professional automotive service platform that connects car owners with verified workshops and certified technicians for maintenance, repair, and emergency services.

faqs.question: How do I book a service?
faqs.answer: You can book a service through our website, mobile app, or by calling our customer service. Simply select your service type, choose a time slot, and we'll handle the rest.

faqs.question: Do you offer pickup and delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer convenient pickup and delivery services. Our team will collect your vehicle from your location and return it after the service is completed.

faqs.question: How is pricing determined?
faqs.answer: Our pricing is transparent and competitive. Costs are determined by the type of service, parts required, and labor involved. You'll receive a detailed quote before any work begins.

faqs.question: What warranty do you provide?
faqs.answer: All our services come with a comprehensive warranty. The warranty period varies depending on the type of service, but we guarantee our work and will address any issues at no additional cost.

metadata.title: FAQ - El7a2ny
metadata.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about El7a2ny's automotive services, booking process, pricing, and warranty.
